snippet: The truth about the inaugural Singapore Grand Prix, in 2008, was not revealed until the next year, when a driver confessed to having intentionally crashed to help his teammate, Fernando Alonso, win the race.
lead_paragraph: The truth about the inaugural Singapore Grand Prix, in 2008, was not revealed until the next year, when a driver confessed to having intentionally crashed to help his teammate, Fernando Alonso, win the race.

headline.main: What a Difference a Year Made
headline.print_headline: What a Difference a Year Made
